commit.message:
ia64.c (ia64_expand_vecint_minmax): Use us_minus and plus for V4HImode UMAX.

        * config/ia64/ia64.c (ia64_expand_vecint_minmax): Use us_minus and
        plus for V4HImode UMAX.

From-SVN: r101441

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+
+	* config/ia64/ia64.c (ia64_expand_vecint_minmax): Use us_minus and
+	plus for V4HImode UMAX.
